summary: like blowing enemy's weapons out of thier hands? like blowing the shit out of them while doing so? good, then this is a mod for you. combines unrelenting force, disarm and dismay shouts into spells and staves. (see what i did with the name? :P)
descriptionHtml:
like blowing enemy's weapons out of thier hands? like blowing the shit out of them while doing so? good, then this is a mod for you. combines unrelenting force, disarm and dismay shouts into spells and staves. I Bring you; this mod! you can now blow the living **** out of your enemys! ..or innocent npcs!
<br /><br /><br /><br />you can do anything! ..well not anything but you know what i mean. there is a balanced version, and a tottaly overpowerd version! with no casting time! :P they can all be found at the exit towards whiterun in a chest next to the bridge at riverwood. iam going to add some really epic staves (totally unbalanced) mostlikely telekinesis making enemys drop thier stuf, or a staff if you hit him he will be attacked by gaurds. i have also added a picture to see where to find it, i have actually made this mod for purpose of making things fly off cliffs and buildings, but also made a balanced version for ppl who want to use it for kiting.
author: crookedyoyo

files.name: unbalanced op fusrodah spells and staff
